meanings.sent1: The corvinas swam gracefully in the clear water.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen caught many corvinas during the fishing competition.
meanings.sent3: The corvinas decided to have a race to see who was the fastest swimmer.
meanings.sent4: The corvinas in the aquarium seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the corvinas sparkled like jewels in the sea.

meanings.sent1: She bought a dozen corvinas to prepare a delicious meal.
meanings.sent2: The market had fresh corvinas on sale at a great price.
meanings.sent3: The corvinas gathered together for a group photo, looking quite photogenic.
meanings.sent4: The corvinas on the plate seemed to smile back at the diner.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cooked corvinas filled the kitchen with a delightful scent.
